LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.label: recon calibration
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.description: A large amount of fire control data is being shared with surrounding friendly forces through this unit, which will temporarily slow down the OS response speed.
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinderBuff.label: received calibration
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinderBuff.description: The missile knows where it is at all times. It knows this because it knows where it isn't. By subtracting where it is from where it isn't, or where it isn't from where it is...
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.label: precise sniping mode
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.description: this unit is at an absolute standstill and uses its built-in ballistic computer to measure extremely detailed shooting data, allowing it to accurately hit the intended target.
